title: Problem with Bot bouncing over burners

cells.data:
Monday July 3, 2017 4:21am
Unable to sleep due to pain in my foot, so I am up coding very early this morning.

Had the bouncing behavior working by using a spring field effect (build in to sprite kit), which worked very well except that it bounce when it was not over the corridor.

My solutions was to turn it on (.isEnabled = true) when over the corridor and turn it off when it’s not. This worked initially when I wrote it, but due to a disaster, I had to roll back my commits a day and had to rewrite it, and now it doesn’ work.
What it does is not bounce in the corridor on some burners and does in others. I’m sure I have solved this earlier, just don’t remember how.

Need to write this stuff down.

10:26am
Finally solved it (I think). Bot was bouncing below tolerance and once there could not get back up again. This would happen occasionally, so was difficult to spot.
